Parameter_Description: The policy number for the insurance policy document
The sub-limit for the associated aggregate limit type provided by the policy in the provided policy document.
The premium provided in the provided policy document.
The coverage provided by the policy in the provided policy document.
The effective, or starting date, of the insurance policy in the provided policy document, in mm/dd/yyyy format.
The ending date, of the insurance policy in the provided policy document, in mm/dd/yyyy format.
The per occurrence coverage limit provided by the policy in the provided policy document.
The name of the insurance company who wrote the policy in the provided policy document.

The aggregate limit type for the largest aggregate limit provided by the policy in the provided policy document. This will usually be called aggregate limit, combined single limit, or something similar.
The name of the company that is "insured"
The id number associated with the Certificate of Insurance Document
The name of the company that holds the certificate
The date on the top of the provided Certificate of Insurance document, in mm/dd/yyyy format.
The policy number or numbers shown on the document as proof of coverages.
The client account number on the invoice document.
The invoice number provided on the Invoice document.
The invoice date, of the Invoice document, in mm/dd/yyyy format.
The currency stated on the invoice document.
The amount that is due on the invoice document.
